title: MRI Software
headline: Open and connected property management platform for commercial and residential real estate.
description: MRI Software is a leading provider of real estate software solutions with an open and connected platform. The company serves over 45,000 clients across 170+ countries, managing 23 million units and 5.5 million leases. MRI offers comprehensive property management, accounting, investment management, and facility management solutions with a partner ecosystem of 400+ integrations.
short_description: Open and connected property management platform for commercial and residential real estate.
pros: Extremely comprehensive suite covering all CRE needs
cons: Pricing can be high for small portfolios
Learning curve due to breadth of features

seo.title: MRI Software Review 2025: Pricing, Features & Alternatives | CRE Software
seo.description: Comprehensive review of MRI Software. Open and connected property management platform for CRE. Compare pricing, features, pros & cons.

tagline: Open and connected property management platform for commercial and residential real estate.

title: Building Engines
headline: AI-powered property operations platform built for commercial real estate.
description: Building Engines, a JLL company, provides the Prism platform—an AI-powered property operations solution built for CRE. Trusted by property teams managing over 6 billion square feet, including trophy buildings like the Empire State Building and One World Trade Center. The platform helps manage building operations end-to-end, improve tenant satisfaction, and grow NOI through streamlined workflows and AI-driven insights.
short_description: AI-powered property operations platform built for CRE.
pros: Proven at scale with 6B+ sq ft managed
cons: May be overkill for smaller portfolios

seo.title: Building Engines Review 2025: Pricing, Features & Alternatives | CRE Software
seo.description: Comprehensive review of Building Engines Prism platform. AI-powered property operations for CRE. Compare pricing, features, pros & cons.

tagline: AI-powered property operations platform built for commercial real estate.

title: Re-Leased
headline: Cloud-based commercial property management software.
description: Re-Leased is a SaaS-based commercial property management platform that operates in the cloud, making property management accounting and bookkeeping more efficient. It helps property managers track key dates, rent escalations, and renewal opportunities while eliminating manual tasks. Users report saving over 35 hours of administration per week and seeing up to 90% savings in property management expenses.
short_description: Cloud-based commercial property management software.
pros: Significant time savings reported by users
Good for international markets (NZ, AU, UK)
cons: Smaller market presence in US compared to competitors
May lack some advanced US-specific compliance features

seo.title: Re-Leased Review 2025: Pricing, Features & Alternatives | CRE Software
seo.description: Comprehensive review of Re-Leased. Cloud-based commercial property management software. Compare pricing, features, pros & cons.

tagline: Cloud-based commercial property management software.

title: Blooma
headline: AI-powered CRE lending and intelligence platform.
description: Blooma empowers CRE lenders—from small teams to large institutions—with real-time insights and seamless automation. It's not an LOS, CRM, or data provider—it's a CRE intelligence engine that augments existing tech stacks. Blooma automates manual data entry and document processing, provides real-time portfolio monitoring with instant alerts, and integrates with existing lending workflows to deliver actionable insights.
short_description: AI-powered CRE lending and intelligence platform.
pros: AI-powered automation reduces manual data entry
cons: Focused specifically on lending—not general CRE

seo.title: Blooma Review 2025: Pricing, Features & Alternatives | CRE Software
seo.description: Comprehensive review of Blooma. AI-powered CRE lending and intelligence platform. Compare pricing, features, pros & cons.

tagline: AI-powered CRE lending and intelligence platform.

title: Accruent
headline: Facilities, asset, and lease management software for the built environment.
description: Accruent provides comprehensive software solutions for managing facilities, real estate, and assets. Their platform covers lease accounting and administration, facility management, capital planning, and space management. Accruent serves organizations across industries including commercial real estate, retail, healthcare, and education with tools to manage the full lifecycle of physical resources.
short_description: Facilities, asset, and lease management software for the built environment.
pros: Comprehensive suite for facilities and lease management

seo.description: Comprehensive review of Accruent. Facilities, asset, and lease management software. Compare pricing, features, pros & cons.

title: Planon
headline: Market-leading smart sustainable building management software.
description: Planon is a market-leading Integrated Workplace Management System (IWMS) provider recognized by Verdantix, IDC, Gartner, and Frost & Sullivan. The platform enables connected places where people work, live, play, and learn. Solutions include IWMS, field and facility services, lease accounting (IFRS 16, ASC 842), campus management, and real estate portfolio management with SAP integration capabilities.
short_description: Market-leading smart sustainable building management software.
pros: Recognized leader by Gartner, Verdantix, and Frost & Sullivan
Global presence with 40+ years in market
cons: Enterprise-only focus—not suitable for smaller firms

seo.description: Comprehensive review of Planon. Market-leading IWMS and smart building management software. Compare pricing, features, pros & cons.

tagline: Market-leading smart sustainable building management software.

title: Prophia
headline: AI-powered lease abstraction and management for commercial real estate.
description: Prophia provides AI-powered lease abstraction that creates dynamic, living abstracts from dozens of documents. The platform powers 493 million+ square feet across 4,425+ buildings with 182,000+ documents processed. Features include self-updating stacking plans, CAM reconciliation tools, rent roll verification, and portfolio analytics. CRE experts audit AI results to ensure accuracy.
short_description: AI-powered lease abstraction and management for commercial real estate.
pros: AI-powered with human CRE expert verification
Dynamic living abstracts linked to source documents

seo.title: Prophia Review 2025: Pricing, Features & Alternatives | CRE Software
seo.description: Comprehensive review of Prophia. AI-powered lease abstraction for CRE. Compare pricing, features, pros & cons.

title: Dottid
headline: Leasing workflow management software for CRE.
description: Dottid is a modern CRE platform for managing lease pipelines and reporting across office, industrial, and retail properties. Features include deal pipeline management, dynamic projections, stacking plans, asset visualization, ARGUS MLAs, capital projects tracking, leasing performance insights, and team workspaces. SOC II compliant with mobile app support.
short_description: Leasing workflow management software for CRE.
pros: Modern UI purpose-built for CRE leasing
cons: Focused on leasing workflow—not full property management

description: Tango powers every stage of the property lifecycle—from site selection to sustainability—with one smart, connected platform. Solutions span corporate real estate, retail location management, projects and maintenance, energy and sustainability, and workplace optimization. Tango helps reduce costs, manage energy efficiency, track carbon accounting, and optimize hybrid workplaces.
short_description: Real estate solutions for streamlining portfolio operations.

The platform integrates with SAP and other ERP systems, offering AI-driven capabilities for lease management, financial analysis, and decision intelligence across HR, finance, and real estate domains.

title: InvestNext

description: InvestNext is a people-centered platform for accessing, nurturing, and managing capital for real estate investment. Features include capital raising automation, investor CRM, investor portal, distribution management, cap table management, document management, K-1 distribution, fund administration, accreditation verification, and KYC/AML compliance. Serves general partners, investor relations teams, finance leaders, and limited partners.

Rated 4.8/5 on G2 based on 313 reviews.

The platform enables GPs to manage fundraising, distributions, investor communications, and banking operations from a single interface. Features include automated distribution payments, investor portal, fund management, and integrated banking services.

The closed-loop solution helps real estate teams cut energy waste, costs, and carbon through intelligent workflows. The platform clarifies building data, prioritizes energy opportunities using agentic AI, executes automation and demand management, and validates results for continuous savings.
short_description: AI-powered building orchestration platform for energy and sustainability.
